edu.umass.cs.surveyman.survey
Class Component

java.lang.Object
  edu.umass.cs.surveyman.survey.Component
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HTMLComponent, StringComponent
public abstract class Component
extends Object
implements Comparable

The abstract base class for things that are laid out on a page. This class encapsulates the main data of the survey. It is used to represent question and option data that is displayed to the respondent.
